title: Karl Turner – 2022 Comments on Matt Hancock Going on I’m a Celebrity
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Karl Turner, the Labour MP for Kingston upon Hull East on Twitter on 1 November 2022.
content:
Can understand the compromise here. Poor Matty would have had to turn down the fee. He will be struggling on his standard MP salary nowadays. What to do? Disappear to Australia for a lot of cash or represent his constituents for his circa 85K? Why doesn’t he cause a by-election?
